name: The Baby Dog Clinic for Pups
name_original: The Baby Dog Clinic for Pups
description:
Hey friends, Do you like pet care? Then come and play this baby dog clinic for pups game. There are lots of interesting views like dressup, bath, food, cardio, nose surgery and much more. First, you can perform dress up view using some tools like clothes, belt, hat and many more. Next, move to the exercise view and doing some cardio exercise. After completing walk and exercise, You have to implement some bath activities using soap, scissors, shower and much more. Then you have to feed some tasty and yummy food to dog. Next will be height growth view, you can do check dog's height & weight. During checking, you get to know a dog has some nose injury and you need to perform surgery using your skills.

Features:
- Perform dog Spa Care activity
- Lots of stylish clothes are available
- Implement Medical treatment
- Available some tasty & yummy food
- Various types of colouring hats
